sqlMap.insert: insert into sys_role_menu_opt( ID, ROLE_ID, MENU_OPT_ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values( #id#, #roleId#, #menuOptId#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: update sys_role_menu_opt set status='0' where id=#id#
update sys_role_menu_opt set status='0' where role_id=#roleId#
sqlMap.select: select id, role_id as roleId, menu_opt_id as menuOptId, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from sys_role_menu_opt where id=#id#
sqlMap.update:
update sys_role_menu_opt
id=#id# role_id=#roleId#
menu_opt_id=#menuOptId#
status=#status#
created=#created#
create_time=#createTime#
updated=#updated#
update_time=#updateTime#
where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, role_id as roleId, menu_opt_id as menuOptId, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from sys_role_menu_opt where status='1'
select id, role_id as roleId, menu_opt_id as menuOptId, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime from sys_role_menu_opt where status='1'
select count(*) from sys_role_menu_opt where status='1'
